content: तालः [तल् एव अण्] {@--1@} The palmyra tree; <ls>Bh. 2. 90</ls>; <ls>R. 15. 23.</ls> {@--2@} A banner formed of the palm. {@--3@} Slapping or clapping the hands together, the noise made by it; <ls>Māl. 5. 23.</ls> {@--4@} Flapping in general. {@--5@} Flapping of the ears of an elephant. {@--6@} Beating time (in music); करकिसलयतालैर्मुग्धया नर्त्यमानं <ls>U. 3. 10</ls>; <ls>Me. 79.</ls> {@--7@} A musical instrument made of bell-metal; <ls>R. 9. 71.</ls> {@--8@} The palm of the hand. {@--9@} A lock, bolt. {@--10@} The hilt of a sword. {@--11@} An epithet of Śiva. {@--12@} (In prosody) A trochee. {@--13@} A particular measure of height. {@--14@} A short span. --लं {@--1@} The nut of the palmyra tree. {@--2@} Yellow orpiment.
